author: Staff Reporter
text:
To create awareness and opportunities for persons with disabilities, Vidya Sagar, an organisation that works with the differently abled, will be holding an exhibition on April 2 and 3 followed by an awareness run. The ‘V access’ initiative aims at reiterating the necessity of creating a more accessible and inclusive community.

The event will highlight the need for social and attitudinal inclusion and accessible technology and will provide technological solutions for the home and workplace. The two-day-long event will start off with a unique ‘Expo’, on the campus of Vidya Sagar, which will showcase various products and equipment of day-to-day utility, assistive devices designed by companies and also, display information on aspects of access.
title: Event to showcase need for accessibility, inclusiveness
